name: nt-message
description: Supporting protobuf functions for Noita Together

scripts.build_proto: pbjs -w commonjs -t static-module ./proto/messages.proto > ./src/pbjs_pb.js && pbts ./src/pbjs_pb.js > ./src/pbjs_pb.d.ts && pbjs -t json ./proto/messages.proto > ./src/pbjs_pb.json
scripts.test: npm run build_proto && tsc --noEmit && npx jest
scripts.build: npm run test && rm -rf dist/* && npx tsc && cp src/pbjs_pb.* dist

author: Kris Reeves
